## Supply Chain Dataset

The primary dataset for hands-on exercises simulates pharmaceutical supply chain data in Ethiopia.

### Description

| Variable | Type | Description |
|----------|------|-------------|
| `facility_id` | string | Unique facility identifier |
| `region` | string | Geographic region |
| `facility_type` | categorical | Hospital, Health Center, Clinic |
| `date` | date | Month of observation |
| `medication_class` | categorical | Type of medication |
| `demand` | numeric | Units demanded |
| `stock_level` | numeric | Units in stock |
| `orders_placed` | numeric | Units ordered |
| `lead_time_days` | numeric | Days to delivery |

### Data Dictionary

Full data dictionary available in the [Google Drive](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/FOLDER_ID).

### Loading the Data

In Google Colab:

```python
import pandas as pd

# Option 1: From GitHub
url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ssylvia/ethiopia-ds-workshop-2026/main/data/supply-chain-sample.csv"
df = pd.read_csv(url)

# Option 2: From Google Drive (if connected)
from google.colab import drive
drive.mount('/content/drive')
df = pd.read_csv('/content/drive/MyDrive/Addis Training/data/supply-chain.csv')
```

## Data Characteristics

- **Time range**: 2023-01 to 2025-12 (synthetic)
- **Facilities**: ~50 facilities across 6 regions
- **Medication classes**: 5 major categories
- **Observations**: ~3,000 rows

## Data Quality Notes

- This is **synthetic data** created for educational purposes
- Patterns are inspired by real-world supply chain dynamics
- Missing values have been intentionally included for learning
- No actual health data or PHI is included
